inclusion.criterion: Patients must sign and date IRB/EC-approved informed consent.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention this, but it is a standard requirement.

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient is 45 years old, so age is met.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have a life expectancy of at least 3 months and Karnofsky performance status ≥ 70%.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention life expectancy or Karnofsky performance status, so it is unknown.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have histologically confirmed TC (thyroid cancer).
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient has anaplastic astrocytoma of the spine, but also mentions 'histologically confirmed TC' in a previous sentence, so it is met.

inclusion.criterion: Tumor disease must be progressive (evidence of disease progression within 6 months).
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient text mentions 'progressive lower extremity weakness and urinary retention' which suggests disease progression.

inclusion.criterion: Patients should not be candidates for surgical resection, external beam radiotherapy or radioiodine.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention this, so it is unknown.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have measurable disease defined by RECIST criteria as at least one lesion at least 2 cm in length by conventional CT techniques or at least 1 cm by spiral CT scan.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention this, so it is unknown.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must not have more than one previous systemic treatment for cancer.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient text mentions '11 cycles of temozolomide 7 days on and 7 days off' which suggests multiple treatments, but also mentions 'prior to undergoing any specific study procedures', so it is met.

inclusion.criterion: Resolution of all acute toxic effects of any prior treatment to NCI - CTCAE (version 3.0) grade < 1.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention this, so it is unknown.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have discontinued from radiation therapy at least 4 weeks before first dose of study treatment and must have recovered from any toxic effects of treatment.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Patient text mentions 'therapy included field radiation t10-l1 followed by 11 cycles of temozolomide', so it is met.

inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention blood pressure, so it is unknown.

inclusion.criterion: Patients must have adequate organ function.
inclusion.label: unknown
inclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention this, so it is unknown.

exclusion.criterion: Prior treatment on sunitinib or other anti-angiogenic therapy.
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: Patient text mentions 'CPT-11 Weekly x4 with Avastin Q2 weeks/ 2 weeks rest and repeat cycle', which suggests prior treatment with Avastin, an anti-angiogenic therapy.

exclusion.criterion: NCI CTCAE grade 3 hemorrhage < 4 weeks of starting study treatment.
exclusion.label: unknown
exclusion.evidence: Patient text does not mention this, so it is unknown.

notes: Key unknowns include life expectancy, Karnofsky performance status, measurable disease, resolution of acute toxic effects, and adequate organ function. Additionally, the patient's history with Avastin may trigger exclusion criteria.
